Package com.bewsoftware.utils.crypto

Class AES

java.lang.Object
com.bewsoftware.utils.crypto.AES
public class AES extends Object
This class contains an as yet incomplete collection of methods for encrypting and decrypting text.

    • encrypt

      public static String encrypt(String algorithm, String input, SecretKey key, IvParameterSpec iv) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidAlgorithmParameterException, InvalidKeyException, BadPaddingException, IllegalBlockSizeException

      NoSuchPaddingException

    • generateIv

      public static IvParameterSpec generateIv()
      Generate an Initialization Vector (IV).

      IV is a pseudo-random value and has the same size as the block that is encrypted.

      Source: https://www.baeldung.com/java-aes-encryption-decryption

      Implementation Note:
      The block size used is: 16.
      Returns:
      IV
